Overload.description: This group reflects stress, pressure and overwhelming sensations.

Disconnection.description: This group reflects feelings of isolation, loneliness or detachment.

Sadness.description: This group reflects emotional pain, loss or hopelessness.

Hope.description: This group reflects optimism, motivation and anticipation of positive outcomes.

Clarity.description: This group reflects mental clarity, relaxation and social connection.

Anxiety.description: This group reflects worry, negative thought patterns and internal struggle.

Fatigue.description: This group reflects exhaustion, sickness and low physical energy.

Motivation.description: This group reflects action, goals, and future-oriented energy.

Neutrality.description: This group reflects emotional neutrality or randomness.

Emergency.description: This group reflects urgent need, lack of plan or cry for help.

Other.description: This group includes tags that do not fit into primary emotional categories.
